Uses of Package
org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site

  • Packages that use org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site 
    Package Description
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.flow
    This package contains Site Kit flow implementations.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.grid.validator
    This package contains implementation of customized validators.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site
    This package contains Vaadin Site Kit core implementation.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.administrator.company
    This package contains company viewlet functionality.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.administrator.customer
    This package contains customer viewlet functionality.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.administrator.group
    This package contains group viewlet functionality.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.administrator.user
    This package contains user viewlet functionality.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.anonymous  
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.viewlet.anonymous.login
    This package contains login viewlet.
    org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.web
    This package contains bare web site as example of Site Kit usage.
